original: **Thanks to Moltard and Kurimu for help
zh_trans: **感谢 Moltard 和 Kurimu 的帮助

original: **Map Status: No Stripper!**
**ze_stilshrine_of_the_miriam**
**Map by Ma/l/go**
**Special thanks to Vueru for textures
zh_trans: **特别感谢 Vueru 提供的材质

original: **An ancient shrine deep within the Jagd Ramooda**
zh_trans: **在贾格·拉穆达深处的一座古老神祠**

original: **Like Raithwall?s tomb this too was constructed in the time of the Galtean Alliance**
zh_trans: **像雷斯沃尔的陵墓一样，这个也是在加尔提亚军盟时期建造的**

original: **Originally to honor the ancient god of swords and martial**
zh_trans: **最初是为了纪念古代的剑与武术之神**

original: **It is said that a Gran Kiltias of long ago selected the Stilshrine to house the relics of Dynast-King Raithwall!**
zh_trans: **据说很久以前的一位格兰·基尔蒂亚斯选择了史提尔神殿来存放国王雷斯沃尔的遗物！**

original: **The Stilshrine of Miriam will open in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: **米利暗遗迹将在 15 秒后打开**

original: **Welcome to Stilshrine of Miriam!**
**A Player has acquired Thunder Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 雷电魔法**

original: **Hold this area for 15 seconds!**
**A Player has acquired Blizzard Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 冰冻魔法**

original: **Walk of Mind segment will unlock in 23 seconds!**
zh_trans: **心灵之墙将在 23 秒后解锁

original: **A Player has acquired Heal Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 治疗魔法**

original: **The Gates of Ward of Measure will open in 15 seconds!**
**We need to find teleport lantern!**
**Well done! Teleport lantern has been activeted!
**A Player has acquired Dark Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 黑暗魔法**

original: **The Gates of Cold Distance will open in 20 seconds!
**Dragon Aevis vanquished!**
**Now we can enter new segment on temple! Find button and open new area!*
zh_trans: **现在我们可以进入神庙新的部分了！找到按钮并开启新区域！*

original: **The Gates will open in 15 seconds!**
**The Gates Ward of Steel will open in 20 seconds!
**It's last hold! defend here for 22 seconds!**
zh_trans: **最后的守点！在这里防守 22 秒！**

original: **Stage completed!**
**Level has been changed on Ultimate Mode**
**A Player has acquired Wind Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 风魔法**

original: **A Player has acquired Fire Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已习得 火魔法**

original: **YOU MUST TO KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES TO WIN**
zh_trans: **你必须杀死所有僵尸才能获胜**

original: **In the distant past the Great Condemner too sought such power and was stricken down by the gods!**
zh_trans: **在遥远的过去，伟大的谴责者也曾寻求这样的力量，却被众神击倒！**

original: ** Even now his spirit is bound within the Stilshrine of Miriam**
zh_trans: **即便到了现在，他的灵魂仍被束缚在米利暗遗迹内**

original: **Know the fate of those who have fallen in their search for strength**
zh_trans: **了解那些在追寻力量过程中倒下之人的命运**

original: **Be careful! Stars are falling from the sky they can be dangerous to us!**
zh_trans: **小心！星星正在从天空坠落，它们可能会对我们造成威胁！**

original: **Nades do more damage**
**Defeat Judge Bergan before ship escape! If you lose we never see him again!**
zh_trans: **在船只逃离前打败裁判长！如果你失败了，我们就再也见不到他了！**

original: 修复第四关最后跳刀BOSS高爆问题stripper已加载(by bxzl)
**You have beaten map! Congratulations! **
**You Journed across the Paramina Rift to the Stilshrine of Miriam**
zh_trans: **你穿越帕拉米纳大峡谷来到了米利暗遗迹**

original: **here rests the gift he entrusted to the Gran Kiltias of his time**
zh_trans: **这里安息着他托付给他那个时代的格兰·基尔蒂亚斯的礼物**

original: **Hold this area for 17 seconds!**
**Seek it out. The Sword of Kings... can cut through nethicite!**
zh_trans: **去寻找它。王者之剑……可以斩断魔石！**

original: **The Gates will open in 10 seconds!**
**The Gates Walk of Prescience will open in 15 seconds!
zh_trans: **先见之廊的大门将在 15 秒后开启！ **

original: **Well done! Teleport lantern has been activeted!**
**Hold this area until teleport start working!**
zh_trans: **坚守这个区域，直到传送开始生效！**

original: **The Myath blocking path! Shoot him!**
**The Myath is defeated! Keep running!**
**The Gates will open in 20 seconds!**
**Hold this area until way is open!**
zh_trans: **守住这个区域，直到道路打开！**

original: **The way past the colossus is open!**
**Esper Mateus vanquished!**
**Defend until the gates is open!**
**The Gates are open! Hurry up take Sword of Kings!**
zh_trans: **大门已开启！赶快去拿王者之剑！**

original: **Hold this area for 8 seconds!**
**A player picked up Sword of Kings**
**Only player with Sword of Kings can save you! Don't let him die!**
zh_trans: **只有拥有王者之剑的玩家才能救你们！别让他死了！**

original: **Wait 12 seconds until teleport is enable!**
**Hold here for 10 seconds!**
**Mateus come back again! Shoot!**
**Mateus vanquished! Keep running!**
**A Player has acquired Oil Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已获得 油魔法**

original: **We have to check what the next segment of the temple is hiding in front of us!**
zh_trans: **我们必须去神庙的下个区域看看里面隐藏着什么！**

original: **Go to the undiscovered part of the temple and explore its nooks and crannies!**
zh_trans: **前往神庙未被发现的部分并探索它的每个角落！**

original: **Hold this area for 20 seconds!**
**Smoke?**
**What could it mean?**
**We get the hell back to city and soon as possible!**
**Hold here! I will take you on the airship.. And then we will back to city!**
zh_trans: **守住这里！我会用飞艇带你走.. 然后我们就回城市！**
